item.title: PC Build for VR Flight Simulators
item.description: Here is my PC part list for a capable Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020 vr machine. It trounces my old PC in performance. Coupled with the new Meta Quest 3, it should make for an extremely immersive experience. My old PC is going to be used as a server, with the GPU used for producing more heat when my room gets cold. PCPartPicker Part List Type Item Price CPU AMD Ryzen 9 5900X 3.
